function.name: pictureMode-setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the picture mode of a TV.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the picture mode.

predefinedPictureMode.description: The predefined picture mode to set (e.g., Standard, Dynamic, Natural, Movie).
